title: Meet Jim Tully on Off-Ramp from KPCC
teaser: Writer, Hollywood player, boxer and all-around fascinating guy Jim Tully is all but forgotten now. Get to know him.
contentencoded:
Writer, Hollywood player, boxer and all-around fascinating guy Jim Tully is all but forgotten now. Get to know him in this story from Off-Ramp from KPCC.
